name: Sushi Bot
description: A sample LINE Chatbot who can handle sushi delivery order.

LINE_CHANNEL_SECRET.description: Secret key to validate the access to your webhook. You can find it in LINE Developers Console.

LINE_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Token to add to your API call for LINE Messaging API. You can find it in LINE Developers Console.

GOOGLE_PROJECT_ID.description: Project ID of Google Cloud Platform which can be found in Agent configuration page of Dialogflow.

GOOGLE_CLIENT_EMAIL.description: Client Email of Google Cloud Platform which can be found in Agent configuration page of Dialogflow.

GOOGLE_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Private Key of Google Cloud Platform which can be found in JSON formatted key file of Google Service Account.

DEBUG.description: Flag to switch debugging level and target scripts.
